00065 
00066 program main
00067 
00068   use constants
00069   use global
00070   use cmfd_execute,  only: execute_cmfd 
00071   use timing,        only: timer_start, timer_stop
00072 
00073   implicit none
00074 
00075 #include <finclude/petsc.h90>
00076 #include <finclude/slepcsys.h>
00077 #include <finclude/slepceps.h>
00078 
00079   ! initialize
00080   call initialize()
00081 
00082   ! begin total timer
00083   call timer_start(time_total)
00084 
00085   ! execute cmfd
00086   call execute_cmfd()
00087 
00088   ! stop timer
00089   call timer_stop(time_total)
00090 
00091   ! finalize run
00092   call finalize()

00096 !==============================================================================
00097 ! INITIALIZE
00098 !==============================================================================
00099 
00100   subroutine initialize()
00101 
00102     integer :: i                    ! loop counter
00103     integer :: argc                 ! number of command line arguments
00104     character(len=25) :: argv       ! a command line argument
00105     character(len=10) :: today_date
00106     character(len=8)  :: today_time
00107 
00108      !========================================
00109      ! INITIALIZE MPI
00110 
00111      ! initialize slepc/petsc
00112     call SlepcInitialize(PETSC_NULL_CHARACTER,ierr)
00113 
00114     ! get mpi info
00115     call MPI_COMM_RANK(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,rank,ierr)
00116     call MPI_COMM_SIZE(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,n_procs,ierr)
00117 
00118     ! find master
00119     if (rank == 0) master = .true.
00120 
00121    
00122     !=========================================
00123     ! WRITE HEADING INFO
00124 
00125     if (master) then
00126 
00127       ! write header
00128       write(*, FMT='(/11(A/))') &
00129     & '    ,o888888o.           ,8.       ,8.          8 8888888888   8 888888888o.      ', &
00130     & '   8888     `88.        ,888.     ,888.         8 8888         8 8888    `^888.   ', &
00131     & ',8 8888       `8.      .`8888.   .`8888.        8 8888         8 8888        `88. ', &
00132     & '88 8888               ,8.`8888. ,8.`8888.       8 8888         8 8888         `88 ', &
00133     & '88 8888              ,8"8.`8888,8^8.`8888.      8 888888888888 8 8888          88 ', &
00134     & '88 8888             ,8" `8.`8888" `8.`8888.     8 8888         8 8888          88 ', &
00135     & '88 8888            ,8"   `8.`88"   `8.`8888.    8 8888         8 8888         ,88 ', &

00137     & '   8888     ,88" ,8"       `8        `8.`8888.  8 8888         8 8888    ,o88P"   ', &
00138     & '    `8888888P"  ,8"         `         `8.`8888. 8 8888         8 888888888P"      ', &
00139     & '__________________________________________________________________________________'
00140 
00141       ! Write version information

00143            '     Developed At:  Massachusetts Institute of Technology'
00144       write(*, FMT='(6X,"Version:",7X,I1,".",I1,".",I1)') &
00145            VERSION_MAJOR, VERSION_MINOR, VERSION_RELEASE
00146 
00147       ! Write the date and time
00148       call get_today(today_date, today_time)
00149       write(*, FMT='(6X,"Date/Time:",5X,A,1X,A)') &
00150            trim(today_date), trim(today_time)
00151 
00152       ! Write information on number of processors
00153       write(*, FMT='(1X,A,I0)') '     MPI Processes: ',n_procs
00154 
00155     end if
00156 
00157     !=======================================
00158     ! PROCESS COMMAND LINE ARGS
00159 
00160     ! get number of command line arguments
00161     argc = COMMAND_ARGUMENT_COUNT()
00162 
00163     ! begin loop around command line args
00164     do i = 1,argc
00165 
00166       ! get that argument
00167       call GET_COMMAND_ARGUMENT(i,argv)
00168 
00169       ! begin case structure
00170       select case(trim(argv))
00171 
00172         ! solver
00173         case('--solver_type')
00174 
00175           ! get next argument
00176           call GET_COMMAND_ARGUMENT(i+1,argv)
00177 
00178           ! set global var
00179           solver_type = trim(argv)
00180 
00181         ! do nothing here
00182         case DEFAULT
00183 
00184       end select
00185 
00186     end do
00187 
00188   end subroutine initialize
00189 
00190 !==============================================================================
00191 ! FINALIZE
00192 !==============================================================================
00193 
00194   subroutine finalize()
00195 
00196     ! finalize slepc/petsc
00197     call SlepcFinalize(ierr)
00198 
00199     ! print output
00200     if (master) then
00201       write(*, FMT='(/,/,A)') 'RESULTS'
00202       write(*, FMT='(A)')     '**********************'
00203       write(*, FMT='(/,"Total Execution time (s): ",F0.4)') time_total%elapsed
00204       write(*, FMT='("K-effective: ",F0.8,/)') cmfd%keff
00205     end if
00206 
00207   end subroutine finalize

00209 !===============================================================================
00210 ! GET_TODAY determines the date and time at which the program began execution
00211 ! and returns it in a readable format
00212 !===============================================================================
00213 
00214   subroutine get_today(today_date, today_time)
00215 
00216     character(10), intent(out) :: today_date
00217     character(8),  intent(out) :: today_time
00218     
00219     integer       :: val(8)
00220     character(8)  :: date_
00221     character(10) :: time_
00222     character(5)  :: zone
00223     
00224     call date_and_time(date_, time_, zone, val)
00225     ! val(1) = year (YYYY)
00226     ! val(2) = month (MM)
00227     ! val(3) = day (DD)
00228     ! val(4) = timezone
00229     ! val(5) = hours (HH)
00230     ! val(6) = minutes (MM)
00231     ! val(7) = seconds (SS)
00232     ! val(8) = milliseconds
00233 
00234     if (val(2) < 10) then
00235        if (val(3) < 10) then
00236           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00237        else
00238           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00239        end if
00240     else
00241        if (val(3) < 10) then
00242           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00243        else
00244           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00245        end if
00246     end if
00247     today_time = time_(1:2) // ":" // time_(3:4) // ":" // time_(5:6)
00248 
00249   end subroutine get_today
00250 
00251 end program main
